trans-unit.source: Additionally, you’ll need sphinx to build the documentation pages. To read the documentation without these dependancies just read the rst files in the doc/source/ directory or the generated documentation on the website.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, you’ll need sphinx to build the documentation pages. To read the documentation without these dependancies just read the rst files in the doc/source/ directory or the generated documentation on the website.

trans-unit.source: And all the people using and testing poezio, and especially the ones present on the jabber chatroom doing bug reports and/or feature requests.
trans-unit.target: Y toda la gente que usa y prueba poezio,y especialmente los presentes en el chatroom de parloteo haciendo informes de errores y/o solicitudes de características.

trans-unit.source: FlashCode (weechat dev) - Useful advices on how to use ncurses efficiently
trans-unit.target: FlashCode (weechat dev)-Consejos útiles sobre cómo usar las enfermeras de manera eficiente

trans-unit.source: If you still have questions, or if you’re lost, don’t hesitate to come talk to us directly on our Jabber chat room (see Contact section).
trans-unit.target: If you still have questions, or if you’re lost, don’t hesitate to come talk to us directly on our Jabber chat room (see Contact section).

trans-unit.source: If you want to contribute, you will be welcome on poezio@muc.poez.io to announce your ideas, what you are going to do, or to seek help if you have trouble understanding some of the code.
trans-unit.target: If you want to contribute, you will be welcome on poezio@muc.poez.io to announce your ideas, what you are going to do, or to seek help if you have trouble understanding some of the code.

trans-unit.source: Please DO report any bug you encounter and ask for any feature you want (we may implement it or not, but it’s always better to ask).
trans-unit.target: Please DO report any bug you encounter and ask for any feature you want (we may implement it or not, but it’s always better to ask).

trans-unit.source: Please see the online documentation for more information on installing, configuring or using poezio: https://doc.poez.io/
trans-unit.target: Please see the online documentation for more information on installing, configuring or using poezio: https://doc.poez.io/

trans-unit.source: Poezio is a console Jabber/XMPP client. Its goal is to use anonymous connections to simply let the user join MultiUserChats. This way, the user doesn’t have to create a Jabber account, exactly like people are using IRC. Poezio’s commands are designed to be (if possible) like commonly used IRC clients (weechat, irssi, etc).
trans-unit.target: Poezio is a console Jabber/XMPP client. Its goal is to use anonymous connections to simply let the user join MultiUserChats. This way, the user doesn’t have to create a Jabber account, exactly like people are using IRC. Poezio’s commands are designed to be (if possible) like commonly used IRC clients (weechat, irssi, etc).

trans-unit.source: Poezio is released under the zlib License. Please read the COPYING file for details.
trans-unit.target: Poezio es liberado bajo la licencia zlib.Por favor,lea el archivo de COPIADO para más detalles.

trans-unit.source: Since version 0.7, poezio can handle real Jabber accounts along with roster and one-to-one conversations, making it a full-featured console Jabber client, but still MultiUserChats-centered. In the future, poezio should implement at a 100% level all XEP related to MUCs, especially XEP 0045.
trans-unit.target: Desde la versión 0.7,poezio puede manejar cuentas reales de Jabber junto con la lista de contactos y las conversaciones uno a uno,convirtiéndolo en un cliente Jabber de consola con todas las funciones,pero aún así centrado en los MultiUserChats.En el futuro,poezio debería implementar al 100% todos los XEP relacionados con los MUC,especialmente el XEP 0045.

trans-unit.source: The artwork logo was made by Gaëtan Ribémont and released under the Creative Commons BY license (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/)
trans-unit.target: The artwork logo was made by Gaëtan Ribémont and released under the Creative Commons BY license (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/)

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to submit changes is through a merge request on gitlab, at https://lab.louiz.org/poezio/poezio, but we also accept contributions on github, or with a simple “please fetch my code on my personal git repository hosted somewhere”
trans-unit.target: The preferred way to submit changes is through a merge request on gitlab, at https://lab.louiz.org/poezio/poezio, but we also accept contributions on github, or with a simple “please fetch my code on my personal git repository hosted somewhere”

trans-unit.source: You need python 3.5 or higher (preferably the latest) and the associated devel package, to build C modules, and the slixmpp python library. You also need aiodns if you want SRV record support.
trans-unit.target: Necesitas python 3.5 o superior (preferiblemente el último)y el paquete de desarrollo asociado,para construir módulos C,y la biblioteca slixmpp python.También necesitas aiodns si quieres soporte de registros SRV.
